context: Retail chain experiencing declining customer satisfaction scores needs to implement comprehensive customer experience improvements

request.purpose: Customer experience transformation across all touchpoints
request.justification: Customer satisfaction dropped 12% YoY, competitors investing heavily in CX leading to market share loss

decision_process.outcome: Identified key pain points in online ordering, in-store experience, and post-purchase support
Selected integrated CX platform with mobile app, loyalty program, and staff training
Approved phased rollout starting with pilot stores

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15% improvement in customer satisfaction, 20% increase in repeat purchases, enhanced brand loyalty

lessons_learned: Customer-centric approach revealed actionable insights, integrated solution addressed multiple touchpoints effectively
